I think this is due to the new roles support and I think it is also fixed. Kim 
please confirm using a roles.xml and fix/ close as appropriate.

I can't reproduce this on I20030930 (or anything since I20030930) with or
without the presence of a roles.xml file.  Under what setup did this occur for
you?  With a roles.xml file? With particular roles enabled?  Did you customize
the perspective in any way?
Yes - I think the roles.xml file is required.

Even with that I can't reproduce.  Tried enabling roles to get to the CVS
perspective and leaving them on, tried enabling and disabling, tried
opening/closing and reopening perspective.  None produce this problem.  Is this
consistantly reproducable for you?
